name: EUROPEAN LOGISTICS PLATFORM
memberOrga:
All members are published on our homepage: 
www.european-logistics-platform.eu
goal: Discuss full range of logistics and supply chains forging a more integrated policy approach to tackle challenges of industry.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Environment, External Relations, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: ELP is monitoring and analysing all developments which are discussed in EU society and the political environment concerning logistics and supply chain industries.
